task.summary: Default task
Changed view port in headers to stop user scaling. With user scaling on, interacting with a form would cause the page to zoom in and not display all the page anymore
Turned on CodeIgniters built in profiler. THIS MUST BE TURNED OFF FOR PRODUCTION. Added flashdata message, which informs the user of a successful newly created tutor
Implemented user sign up
Added the ability to store current logged in user data to the session data through the 'auth' and 'user_auth' files
Moved the location of welcome messages
Incorporated Font Awesome into the project
Added time of day based message using PHPs date function. Depending at what time of day the user logs in, depends on the message they get
Implemented user profile page
Implemented edit profile
Implemented update password
Added Google Fonts to the headers
Started to implement project view page
Created a nl2p helper. It contains helper function that wraps p tags around text that contains newlines. Implemented it in the single project view
Created a maxLength helper. It contains helper function that cuts down a strign that is over 100 characters. Implemented it in the projects view
Implemented datatables. Used on the projects view
Change the add_tutor() method in the model to insert the same id in both the tutor and admin tables
Changed the projects model so when a project is added. the ID of the tutor who added it is also recorded and added to the database
Beginning to implement admin dashboard features. Any project that is going to expire will be shown to the admin when they login
Started to add an expiry table to the admin dashboard. This table shows if a project has expired and gives the admin the option to delete, extend or view the project
Changed button placement to avoid accidental clicks
Implemented the ability to extend a project by 12 months and delete it if it has expired
Added foundation to all admin proposal files. Fixed issues with normalize.css removing the margins from certain elements
Implemented course CRUD
Added datatables and foundation functionality to all aspects of the admin area
Created individual proposal page
Implemented the ability for user to show interest in a project proposal
Implemented the ability for a tutor to see when a student is interested in a project proposal and for that tutor to either email the student or delete the interest notification
Reverted back to an old notice on the admin dashboard
Cleaned up the admin login page. Still needs foundation functionality adding to it
Implemented the ability for a user to favourite a project
Implemented the ability for a user to see which their favourite projects. Fixed semantic errors in the the admin dashboard.
Minor semantic changes.
Changed standard font to 'font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;'
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Changed the length of the text displayed in the proposal short description
Created header for desktop view
Added parallax scrolling to header
Created customer header for desktop version, started to implment the mobile version
Created mobile header and mobile navigation
Modified admin header and footer the match user side styles
Implemented admin header across all admin pages
Implemented admin header across all admin edit pages
Implemented admin header across all admin add pages
Implemented the ability to add a tutors research interests
Created a function that measures the amount of characters in a field and displays that information to the user
